properties.displayName: Malicious PE Execution by Microsoft Visual Studio Debugger
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\vsjitdebugger.exe" and (not(((FolderPath contains "\\vsimmersiveactivatehelper" and FolderPath contains ".exe") or FolderPath endswith "\\devenv.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
There is an option for a MS VS Just-In-Time Debugger "vsjitdebugger.exe" to launch specified executable and attach a debugger.
This option may be used adversaries to execute malicious code by signed verified binary.
The debugger is installed alongside wi
